comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Frederic Courtland Penfield (1855-1922), US diplomat and writer, based in Europe: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederic_Courtland_Penfield I presume that's the second wife he married in 1908, Anne Weightman Walker. (It was also her second marriage.) Her father, William Weightman (1813-1904) was a wealthy Philadelphian: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Weightman When William died, Anne became one of the wealthiest women in the world.
